data.comment: The big names in today's match at EDION Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Ryuji Sato signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
In the minute 2, Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
In the minute 6, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Tsukasa Morishima (Hiroshima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Kawasaki.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kawasaki are pushing forward but Manabu Saito's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 15, Hiroshima's Leandro Pereira misses with an attempt on goal.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
Kawasaki needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 17, Kawasaki's Leandro Damiao gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hiroshima defender.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In Hiroshima Kawasaki attack through Ao Tanaka. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 18, Ryuji Sato awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at EDION Stadium.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In the minute 20, Kawasaki drives forward and Yasuto Wakizaka gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Hiroshima's Yuya Asano is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, In Hiroshima, Akihiro Ienaga of Kawasaki is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Ao Tanaka gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kawasaki.
In the minute 31, Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Ryuji Sato awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Kawasaki.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 36, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Kawasaki push upfield and Leandro Damiao gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Hiroshima defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 41, Kawasaki surge into the attack at EDION Stadium but Kazuya Yamamuraâ€™s header is off-target.
Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Leandro Damiao hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Kawasaki in Hiroshima.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Kawasaki's area.
In the minute 44, At EDION Stadium, Hiroshima are penalized for being offside.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kawasaki's half?
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Hiroshima.
The first-half is over.
Ryuji Sato has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Ryuji Sato signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Hiroshima are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 48, Ryuji Sato awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
In the minute 53, Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
Kaoru Mitoma is replacing Yasuto Wakizaka for Kawasaki at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 55, Kawasaki make their second substitution with Reo Hatate replacing Manabu Saito.
Kawasaki's Leandro Damiao scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
Kyohei Noborizato instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 57, Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ryuji Sato signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
In the minute 60, Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Hiroshima's Toshihiro Aoyama breaks free at EDION Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 61, Kawasaki advance rapidly upfield but Ryuji Sato blows for offside.
Important block from the Kawasaki defence as Leandro Pereira fires in a strike for Hiroshima.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Yoshifumi Kashiwa is replacing Yusuke Chajima for the home team.
Hiroshima drive forward but Leandro Pereira is judged offside.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Kawasaki.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
Tsukasa Morishima (Hiroshima) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Kawasaki defenders.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
In the minute 73, The home team replace Tsukasa Morishima with Ezequiel.
Hiroya Matsumoto is on a sub for Yuya Asano for Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 75, Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kawasaki needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 76, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Ryuji Sato.
Yuki Nogami (Hiroshima) strikes at EDION Stadium but his header is cleared.
Kawasaki have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, The match at EDION Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jung Sung-Ryong, who is down injured.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Jung Sung-Ryong returns to the field for Kawasaki after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 78, Ball safe as Kawasaki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Hiroshima.
Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Kawasaki's area.
Toru Oniki (Kawasaki) is making a third substitution, with Yu Kobayashi replacing Leandro Damiao.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Kawasaki at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Kawasaki.
Hiroshima are caught offside.
In the minute 85, Toru Oniki is making the team's fourth substitution at EDION Stadium with Taisei Miyashiro replacing Yu Kobayashi.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Kawasaki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kawasaki's half?
In the minute 87, Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kawasaki's half?
Ryuji Sato signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
In the minute 88, Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Taisei Miyashiro of Kawasaki gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ryuji Sato awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Kawasaki.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
Ryuji Sato signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Kawasaki territory.
Free kick Kawasaki.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Hiroshima make their fourth substitution with Kodai Dohi replacing Toshihiro Aoyama.
Goal! Kawasaki extend their lead to 0-2 through Kaoru Mitoma.
Great play from Taisei Miyashiro to set up the goal.
